alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:13AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dale and west central Henry Counties in Southeast Alabama through NOON CST... At 1112 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newton, or near Daleville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Newville, Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Kirkland Crossroads, Knox Field, Mabson, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Dale County Lake, Dancey and Sylvan Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
